synopsis.text: Believing his quest for vengeance to be over, Kurapika is shocked to discover that the Phantom Troupe, also known as the Spiders, are still alive. With this revelation, Kurapika, joined by his loyal friends Gon, Killua, and Leorio, embarks on a perilous mission to capture a Spider member whose ability poses a dire threat to Kurapika. As they navigate through the secret Yorkshire auction, the group must balance their daytime pursuit of funds for the ultra-rare game, Greed Island, with their nighttime battle to protect the auction pieces and defeat the Spiders. Will their conflicting objectives jeopardize their mission and put them in unforeseen danger? Based on the manga by Togashi Yoshihiro, this anime follows the events of the first TV series, leading Gon, Kurapika, and their friends on a thrilling and treacherous adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
